title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/click-effect
author: pmario
name: Click Effect
readme: The full documentation can be found at [[click-effect plugin|https://wikilabs.github.io/editions/click-effect/]] main page. ! Basics This plugin shows a little "click animation" if the left mouse button is released ! Settings Th current setting is: ''{{$:/config/clickEffect}}'' | Setting | Description |h |<$radio field="text" tiddler="$:/config/clickEffect" value="clickEffect"> Click Effect |A little click animation is shown at the cursor position | |<$radio field="text" tiddler="$:/config/clickEffect" value="pulse"> Element Pulse |The html-element, that is clicked is highlighted | |<$radio field="text" tiddler="$:/config/clickEffect" value="no"> Off |No click-animaiton is shown| ---- ''Important'': This plugin modifies several core modules <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/wikilabs/click-effect]plugintiddlers[]prefix[$:/core/]]"><$link to=<>><>
